doc:
Richard Erdman https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Richard_Erdman 0 Richard "Dick" Erdman (born June 1, 1925) is an American actor and occasional director. He appeared in more than 160 film, television and theater productions since 1944, mostly in supporting roles. Richard_"_Dick_"_Erdman ( born June_1_,_1925 ) is an_American_actor and occasional_director . He appeared in more_than_160_film_,_television_and_theater_productions since 1944 , mostly_in supporting roles .
